abstract: Warren Lichtenstein is lifting the gates for redemptions on his $1.2 billion Steel Partners II fund, but investors are none too pleased, The New York Post reports.
snippet: Warren Lichtenstein is lifting the gates for redemptions on his $1.2 billion Steel Partners II fund, but investors are none too pleased, The New York Post reports.
lead_paragraph: Warren Lichtenstein is lifting the gates on his $1.2 billion Steel Partners II fund, but investors are apparently none too pleased by the announcement.

headline.main: Offer Is Said to Anger Steel Partners Investors
